step.name: Select Load TS Stats
step.sql: select y.site_title as SiteName, y.site_bk as SiteBK, meter_event_site_fk as SiteTK, meter_event_lc_date_fk as LocalDateMax, meter_event_lc_time_fk as LocalTimeMax, y.cfm_time_zone as TimeZone from ( select meter_event_site_fk, meter_event_lc_date_fk, meter_event_lc_time_fk , row_number() over (partition by meter_event_site_fk order by meter_event_lc_date_fk desc, meter_event_lc_time_fk desc) as rn from fct_meter_event ) as x inner join dim_site as y on y.site_key = x.meter_event_site_fk where rn = 1

step.name: Select Load TS Stats
Select Load TS Stats
step.sql: select y.site_title as SiteName, y.site_bk as SiteBK, meter_event_site_fk as SiteTK, meter_event_lc_date_fk as LocalDateMax, meter_event_lc_time_fk as LocalTimeMax, y.cfm_time_zone as TimeZone from ( select meter_event_site_fk, meter_event_lc_date_fk, meter_event_lc_time_fk , row_number() over (partition by meter_event_site_fk order by meter_event_lc_date_fk desc, meter_event_lc_time_fk desc) as rn from fct_meter_event ) as x inner join dim_site as y on y.site_key = x.meter_event_site_fk where rn = 1

step.name: Select Load TS Stats
Table input
step.sql: SELECT meter_event_utc_date_fk as utc_dateTK, meter_event_utc_time_fk as utc_timeTK, meter_event_power as load, meter_event_power_30min_mavg as smoothed_load, meter_event_energy as usage FROM ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event WHERE ((meter_event_utc_date_fk >= ? and meter_event_utc_time_fk >= ?) or (meter_event_utc_date_fk <= ? and meter_event_utc_time_fk <= ?)) and meter_event_site_fk = ? ORDER BY meter_event_utc_date_fk ASC, meter_event_utc_time_fk ASC;

step.name: Table input
step.sql: SELECT meter_event_lc_date_fk, meter_event_lc_time_fk, meter_event_power, meter_event_power_30min_mavg, meter_event_energy FROM ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event WHERE meter_event_lc_date_fk >= ? and meter_event_lc_time_fk >= ? and meter_event_site_fk = ? and meter_event_lc_date_fk <= ? and meter_event_lc_time_fk <= ? ORDER BY meter_event_lc_date_fk ASC, meter_event_lc_time_fk ASC

jsScript.jsScript_script: var resObj = JSON.parse(result); var hasTrendData = resObj.trendData.length > 0;
var resObj = JSON.parse(smoothedResult); var hasSmoothedTrendData = resObj.trendData.length > 0;

step.name: Table input
step.sql: SELECT weather_station_event_lc_date_fk as tz_dateTK, weather_station_event_lc_time_key as tz_timeTK, weather_station_event_temp as temp FROM ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_weather_station_event WHERE weather_station_event_lc_date_fk >= ? and weather_station_event_lc_time_key >= ? and weather_station_event_weather_station_key = ? and weather_station_event_lc_date_fk <= ? and weather_station_event_lc_time_key <= ? ORDER BY weather_station_event_lc_date_fk ASC, weather_station_event_lc_time_key ASC

step.name: Table input
step.sql: SELECT weather_station_event_weather_station_key as wsTK, weather_station_event_utc_date_fk as utc_dateTK, weather_station_event_utc_time_key as utc_timeTK, weather_station_event_temp as temperature FROM ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_weather_station_event WHERE ((weather_station_event_utc_date_fk >= ? and weather_station_event_utc_time_key >= ?) or (weather_station_event_utc_date_fk <= ? and weather_station_event_utc_time_key <= ?)) and weather_station_event_weather_station_key = ? ORDER BY weather_station_event_utc_date_fk ASC, weather_station_event_utc_time_key ASC;

step.name: Table input
step.sql: SELECT zone_rt_settled_price_lc_date_fk as tz_dateTK, zone_rt_settled_price_lc_time_fk as tz_timeTK, zone_rt_settled_price_value as price FROM ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_zone_rt_settled_price WHERE zone_rt_settled_price_lc_date_fk >= ? and zone_rt_settled_price_lc_time_fk >= ? and zone_rt_settled_price_zone_fk = ? and zone_rt_settled_price_lc_date_fk <= ? and zone_rt_settled_price_lc_time_fk <= ? ORDER BY zone_rt_settled_price_lc_date_fk ASC, zone_rt_settled_price_lc_time_fk ASC

hop.to: Log ZonePrice REST after TZ conv

hop.from: Log ZonePrice REST after TZ conv

step.name: Log ZonePrice REST after TZ conv
Table input
step.sql: SELECT zone_rt_settled_price_zone_fk as zoneTK, zone_rt_settled_price_utc_date_fk as utc_dateTK, zone_rt_settled_price_utc_time_fk as utc_timeTK, zone_rt_settled_price_value as price FROM ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_zone_rt_settled_price WHERE ((zone_rt_settled_price_utc_date_fk >= ? and zone_rt_settled_price_utc_time_fk >= ?) or (zone_rt_settled_price_utc_date_fk <= ? and zone_rt_settled_price_utc_time_fk <= ?)) and zone_rt_settled_price_zone_fk = ? ORDER BY zone_rt_settled_price_utc_date_fk ASC, zone_rt_settled_price_utc_time_fk ASC;

notepad.note: 1. Get global variable for default cutoff time (starting time for meter data query) 2. Parse that string into a Date object 3. In "Stream Lookup" step, select max time for this Site/default meter. If there is a record then use its "time_fk", otherwise use the default cutoff time.

hop.from: Select Site Event TS Date Min

step.name: Select Site BK & Title
step.sql: SELECT DISTINCT site_key, site_bk, site_title, cfm_time_zone AS site_cfm_time_zone, site_default_meter_type, site_default_meter_bk from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_site WHERE site_default_meter_bk <> 'N/A'

step.name: Select Site Event TS Date Min
step.sql: select meter_event_site_fk as meter_max_site_key, meter_event_utc_date_min_fk as utc_date_min, meter_event_utc_time_min_fk as utc_time_min from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event_stats;

step.name: Execute SQL script
Insert Hrly w/ Min
step.sql: INSERT INTO ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event_aggr_hrly ( meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_min_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_max_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_avg_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_date_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_time_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_date_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_time_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_site_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_meter_event_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_count) select min(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_usage, max(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_usage, avg(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_usage, min(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_demand, max(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_demand, avg(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_demand, min(meter_event_demand_sma_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_min_30min_mavg, max(meter_event_demand_sma_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_max_30min_mavg, avg(meter_event_demand_sma_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_avg_30min_mavg, fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_date_fk, lc_dim_time.time_hour*100 as meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_time_fk, fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_date_fk, utc_dim_time.time_hour*100 as meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_time_fk, dim_site.site_key as meter_event_aggr_hrly_site_fk, fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_meter_event_fk, count(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_count from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as lc_dim_time on lc_dim_time.time_key = meter_event_lc_time_fk inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as utc_dim_time on utc_dim_time.time_key = meter_event_utc_time_fk inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_site as dim_site on dim_site.site_key = meter_event_site_fk where ((meter_event_utc_date_fk >= ?) and (meter_event_utc_date_fk < ?)) and meter_event_site_fk = ? group by dim_site.site_key,fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk,lc_dim_time.time_hour,fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk,utc_dim_time.time_hour having count(meter_event_demand) = 61 or count(meter_event_demand) = 60;

step.name: Insert Hrly w/o Min
step.sql: INSERT INTO ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event_aggr_hrly ( meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_min_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_max_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_avg_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_date_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_time_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_date_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_time_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_site_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_meter_event_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_count) select min(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_usage, max(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_usage, avg(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_usage, min(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_demand, max(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_demand, avg(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_demand, min(meter_event_demand_sma_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_min_30min_mavg, max(meter_event_demand_sma_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_max_30min_mavg, avg(meter_event_demand_sma_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_avg_30min_mavg, fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_date_fk, lc_dim_time.time_hour*100 as meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_time_fk, fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_date_fk, utc_dim_time.time_hour*100 as meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_time_fk, dim_site.site_key as meter_event_aggr_hrly_site_fk, fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_meter_event_fk, count(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_count from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as lc_dim_time on lc_dim_time.time_key = meter_event_lc_time_fk inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as utc_dim_time on utc_dim_time.time_key = meter_event_utc_time_fk inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_site as dim_site on dim_site.site_key = meter_event_site_fk where ((meter_event_utc_date_fk >= ?) and (meter_event_utc_date_fk < ?)) and meter_event_site_fk = ? group by dim_site.site_key,fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk,lc_dim_time.time_hour,fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk,utc_dim_time.time_hour having count(meter_event_demand) = 61 or count(meter_event_demand) = 60;

step.name: Read Aggr Hrly MINs
Select Site Key & Title
step.sql: SELECT DISTINCT site_key, site_title, cfm_time_zone AS site_cfm_time_zone, site_default_meter_type, site_default_meter_bk from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_site WHERE site_default_meter_bk <> 'N/A'

step.name: Execute SQL script
Insert Hrly w/ Min
step.sql: INSERT INTO ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event_gb_hrly ( meter_event_gb_hrly_usage, meter_event_gb_hrly_demand, meter_event_gb_hrly_demand_30min_mavg, meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_date_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_time_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_date_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_time_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_site_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_meter_event_fk) select main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_usage as meter_event_gb_hrly_usage, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_demand as meter_event_gb_hrly_demand, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_demand_sma_30min as meter_event_gb_hrly_demand_30min_mavg, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_date_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_time_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_time_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_date_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_time_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_time_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_site_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_site_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_key as meter_event_gb_hrly_meter_event_fk from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event as main_fct_meter_event, ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as dim_time where ((meter_event_utc_date_fk >= ?) or (meter_event_utc_date_fk = ? and meter_event_utc_time_fk >= ?)) and ((meter_event_utc_date_fk < ?) or (meter_event_utc_date_fk = ? and meter_event_utc_time_fk < ?)) and meter_event_site_fk = ? and dim_time.time_key = main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_time_fk and dim_time.time_1hr_grp_value = 1

step.name: Insert Hrly w/o Min
step.sql: INSERT INTO ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event_gb_hrly ( meter_event_gb_hrly_usage, meter_event_gb_hrly_demand, meter_event_gb_hrly_demand_30min_mavg, meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_date_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_time_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_date_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_time_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_site_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_meter_event_fk) select main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_usage as meter_event_gb_hrly_usage, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_demand as meter_event_gb_hrly_demand, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_demand_sma_30min as meter_event_gb_hrly_demand_30min_mavg, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_date_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_time_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_time_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_date_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_time_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_time_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_site_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_site_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_key as meter_event_gb_hrly_meter_event_fk from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event as main_fct_meter_event, ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as dim_time where ((meter_event_utc_date_fk >= ?) or (meter_event_utc_date_fk = ? and meter_event_utc_time_fk >= ?)) and ((meter_event_utc_date_fk < ?) or (meter_event_utc_date_fk = ? and meter_event_utc_time_fk < ?)) and meter_event_site_fk = ? and dim_time.time_key = main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_time_fk and dim_time.time_1hr_grp_value = 1

step.sql: select meter_event_site_fk as max_dt_site_key, meter_event_utc_date_max_fk as utc_date_max, meter_event_utc_time_max_fk as utc_time_max from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event_stats;

step.name: Execute SQL script
Insert Hrly w/ Max
step.sql: INSERT INTO ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event_aggr_hrly ( meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_min_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_max_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_avg_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_date_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_time_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_date_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_time_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_site_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_meter_event_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_count) select min(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_usage, max(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_usage, avg(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_usage, min(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_demand, max(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_demand, avg(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_demand, min(meter_event_demand_ema_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_min_30min_mavg, max(meter_event_demand_ema_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_max_30min_mavg, avg(meter_event_demand_ema_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_avg_30min_mavg, fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_date_fk, lc_dim_time.time_hour*100 as meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_time_fk, fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_date_fk, utc_dim_time.time_hour*100 as meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_time_fk, dim_site.site_key as meter_event_aggr_hrly_site_fk, fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_meter_event_fk, count(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_count from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as lc_dim_time on lc_dim_time.time_key = meter_event_lc_time_fk inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as utc_dim_time on utc_dim_time.time_key = meter_event_utc_time_fk inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_site as dim_site on dim_site.site_key = meter_event_site_fk where ((meter_event_utc_date_fk > ?) or ((meter_event_utc_date_fk = ?) and (meter_event_utc_time_fk > ?))) and meter_event_site_fk = ? group by dim_site.site_key,fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk,lc_dim_time.time_hour,fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk,utc_dim_time.time_hour having count(meter_event_demand) = 61 or count(meter_event_demand) = 60;

step.name: Insert Hrly w/o Max
step.sql: INSERT INTO ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event_aggr_hrly ( meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_usage, meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_demand, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_min_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_max_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_avg_30min_mavg, meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_date_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_time_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_date_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_time_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_site_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_meter_event_fk, meter_event_aggr_hrly_count) select min(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_usage, max(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_usage, avg(meter_event_usage) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_usage, min(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_min_demand, max(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_max_demand, avg(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_avg_demand, min(meter_event_demand_ema_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_min_30min_mavg, max(meter_event_demand_ema_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_max_30min_mavg, avg(meter_event_demand_ema_30min) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_demand_avg_30min_mavg, fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_date_fk, lc_dim_time.time_hour*100 as meter_event_aggr_hrly_lc_time_fk, fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_date_fk, utc_dim_time.time_hour*100 as meter_event_aggr_hrly_utc_time_fk, dim_site.site_key as meter_event_aggr_hrly_site_fk, fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_aggr_hrly_meter_event_fk, count(meter_event_demand) as meter_event_aggr_hrly_count from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as lc_dim_time on lc_dim_time.time_key = meter_event_lc_time_fk inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as utc_dim_time on utc_dim_time.time_key = meter_event_utc_time_fk inner join ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_site as dim_site on dim_site.site_key = meter_event_site_fk where ((meter_event_utc_date_fk > ?) or ((meter_event_utc_date_fk = ?) and (meter_event_utc_time_fk > ?))) and meter_event_site_fk = ? group by dim_site.site_key,fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk,lc_dim_time.time_hour,fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk,utc_dim_time.time_hour having count(meter_event_demand) = 61 or count(meter_event_demand) = 60;

step.name: Read Aggr Hrly MAXs
Select Site Key & Title
step.sql: SELECT DISTINCT site_key, site_title, cfm_time_zone AS site_cfm_time_zone, site_default_meter_type, site_default_meter_bk from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_site WHERE site_default_meter_bk <> 'N/A'

step.name: Execute SQL script
Insert Hrly w/ Max
step.sql: INSERT INTO ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event_gb_hrly ( meter_event_gb_hrly_usage, meter_event_gb_hrly_demand, meter_event_gb_hrly_demand_30min_mavg, meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_date_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_time_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_date_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_time_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_site_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_meter_event_fk) select main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_usage as meter_event_gb_hrly_usage, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_demand as meter_event_gb_hrly_demand, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_demand_ema_30min as meter_event_gb_hrly_demand_30min_mavg, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_date_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_time_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_time_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_date_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_time_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_time_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_site_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_site_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_key as meter_event_gb_hrly_meter_event_fk from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event as main_fct_meter_event, ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as dim_time where ((meter_event_utc_date_fk > ?) or (meter_event_utc_date_fk = ? and meter_event_utc_time_fk > ?)) and meter_event_site_fk = ? and dim_time.time_key = main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_time_fk and dim_time.time_1hr_grp_value = 1

step.name: Insert Hrly w/o Max
step.sql: INSERT INTO ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event_gb_hrly ( meter_event_gb_hrly_usage, meter_event_gb_hrly_demand, meter_event_gb_hrly_demand_30min_mavg, meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_date_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_time_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_date_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_time_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_site_fk, meter_event_gb_hrly_meter_event_fk) select main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_usage as meter_event_gb_hrly_usage, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_demand as meter_event_gb_hrly_demand, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_demand_ema_30min as meter_event_gb_hrly_demand_30min_mavg, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_date_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_date_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_lc_time_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_lc_time_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_date_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_date_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_time_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_utc_time_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_site_fk as meter_event_gb_hrly_site_fk, main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_key as meter_event_gb_hrly_meter_event_fk from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event as main_fct_meter_event, ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_time as dim_time where ((meter_event_utc_date_fk > ?) or (meter_event_utc_date_fk = ? and meter_event_utc_time_fk > ?)) and meter_event_site_fk = ? and dim_time.time_key = main_fct_meter_event.meter_event_utc_time_fk and dim_time.time_1hr_grp_value = 1

step.name: Read Aggr Hrly MAXs
Select Site Key & Title
step.sql: SELECT DISTINCT site_key, site_title, cfm_time_zone AS site_cfm_time_zone, site_default_meter_type, site_default_meter_bk from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_site WHERE site_default_meter_bk <> 'N/A'
